com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface Renderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClearTheme.ComponentRenderer, GameSenseTheme.ComponentRenderer, HUDPanel.HUDRenderer, RendererBase, RendererProxy, ThemeMultiplexer.ComponentRenderer, ThemeMultiplexer.ContainerRenderer, ThemeMultiplexer.PanelRenderer

    public interface Renderer
    An Interface to standardize the appearance of different components.

    • Method Summary

        int getHeight(boolean open)
        Returns the default height for components.
        Parameters:
        open - true if the component in question the the title bar for an open container
        Returns:
        the component height

      • getLeftBorder

        int getLeftBorder(boolean scroll)
        Returns the left horizontal border around an entire container.

        scroll - whether the container was restricted due to scrolling
        Returns:
        the horizontal border

        Returns the right horizontal border around an entire container.

        Returns:
        the horizontal border

      • renderTitle

        void renderTitle(Context context,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 boolean focus)
        Render the title bar for a component, while deciding whether to render an active or inactive title bar.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        text - the caption of the component
        focus - the focus state for the component

      • renderTitle

                 java.lang.String text,
                 boolean focus,
                 boolean active)
        Render the title bar for a component.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        text - the caption of the component
        focus - the focus state for the component
        active - whether the component is active or inactive

      • renderTitle

        void renderTitle(Context context,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 boolean focus,
                 boolean active,
                 boolean open)
        Render the title bar for a container.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        text - the caption of the component
        focus - the focus state for the component
        active - whether the component is active or inactive
        open - whether the container is open or closed

      • renderRect

        void renderRect(Context context,
                java.lang.String text,
                boolean focus,
                boolean active,
                java.awt.Rectangle rectangle,
                boolean overlay)
        Render partial title bar (e.g. for a slider).
        Parameters:
        context - the Context for the component
        text - the caption of the component
        focus - the focus state for the component
        active - whether the component is active or inactive
        rectangle - the rectangle defining the title bar
        overlay - whether to render mouse hover overlay

      • renderScrollBar

        int renderScrollBar(Context context,
                    boolean focus,
                    boolean active,
                    boolean scroll,
                    int childHeight,
                    int scrollPosition)
        Renders the scroll bar for a container
        Parameters:
        context - context the Context for the component
        focus - the focus state for the component
        active - whether the component is active or inactive
        scroll - whether the container has scrolling active
        childHeight - the total height of the children
        scrollPosition - the current scroll position
        Returns:
        the new scroll position

      • overrideColorScheme

        void overrideColorScheme(ColorScheme scheme)
        Overrides the default color scheme. restoreColorScheme() should always be called after rendering using a custom color scheme is finished.
        Parameters:
        scheme - the custom color scheme

      • restoreColorScheme

        void restoreColorScheme()
        Restores the default color scheme.
